SEARCH
Package com.warzone.elements

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.warzone.elements.Player
public class Player extends Object
Player in a game contains information about the continents and countries controlled by player, cards the player have, method to order input from user, queue to store player order and number of reinforcement armies player have.

    • d_orders

      public Queue<Orders> d_orders
      This Queue stores the object of type Orders for each Player to be executed in FIFO pattern later.

    • d_numberOfArmies

      private int d_numberOfArmies

    • d_isCommit

      private boolean d_isCommit

    • d_cardsOwned

      public HashMap<String,Integer> d_cardsOwned
      This hashmap stores the number of cards owned in key value format where key is name of card and value is number of cards available to the player. Example: (bomb, 2), i.e. player owns 2 bomb cards.

    • d_negotiatedPlayerNames

      public ArrayList<String> d_negotiatedPlayerNames
      This array list stores the name of players for which diplomacy card is used for negotiation.

    • d_isConquered

      public boolean d_isConquered
      This boolean stores if the country is conquered or not by the player.

    • d_strategy

      public PlayerStrategy d_strategy
      This is the type of Strategy that the player possess.

    • getIsCommit

      public boolean getIsCommit()
      method to get boolean value which depicts that player has no more orders in this turn.
      Returns:
      true if player has no more orders; else false

    • setIsCommit

      public void setIsCommit(boolean p_isCommit)
      method used to set whenever player has no more values or when the turn has started. Set to false at start of each turn and to true when player has no more orders.
      Parameters:
      p_isCommit - true if player has no more orders; else false.

    • issue_order

      public void issue_order()
      method to issue order called by Game engine

    • checkContinent

      public boolean checkContinent(Continent p_continent)
      method to check if player owns all countries of a continent
      Parameters:
      p_continent - continent for which ownership is to be checked
      Returns:
      true if player owns all the countries of continent; else false
